net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.audio
Class AMRNBStream

java.lang.Object
  net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.MediaStream
      net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.audio.AudioStream
          net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.audio.AMRNBStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stream
public class AMRNBStream
extends AudioStream

A class for streaming AMR-NB from the microphone of an android device using RTP. Call #setDestinationAddress(java.net.InetAddress), {@link #prepare()} & {@link #start()} and that's it ! Call {@link #stop()} to stop the stream. Do not forget to call {@link #release()} when you're done.

Method Detail

generateSessionDescription

public java.lang.String generateSessionDescription()
Returns a description of the stream using SDP. It can then be included in an SDP file.
